name: Paul Richert
text: This spot is the one I like best. I eat in plenty of restaurants but to this one I  constantly return again and again. The crew is very attentive and the cuisine they offer is so good. I never miss an opportunity to have a good dinner in this restaurant. I highly recommend this place.

name: Jamie Topliffe
text: This place is hit or miss. Sometimes my pizza is great and sometimes it's awful so I guess it's luck of the draw who is working at the time. Usually quick pick up. Nothing special about the service.

name: Gary Rose
text: Last week was our first time we went to this fine restaurant. But It is surely not the last time. We enjoyed the evening a lot with the efficient service, with the excellent  food and wine and with the honest pay. We will surely return there again.

name: Liana Fontan
text: Family Owned.. ordered online.. pizza was made with just the right toppings and on time and hot when picked up!! Thank you so much.. the kids loved it!!

name: Kirk Fisher
text:
Best pizza hut I've ever been to. W
